metadata.name: Richard Anderson

persona.name: Robert King
persona.role: Existing customer, franchise gym owner (2 locations)
persona.goal: Renew/renegotiate service terms and schedule a callback with sales
persona.context: Current contract nearing renewal; wants to avoid price increases; can approve purchase but wants options laid out

intent.name: Check Availability at a Business Address
intent.description: A new prospect wants to confirm serviceability for a specific business location before proceeding.
intent.goal: Provide the next step to verify address and schedule a callback to complete qualification.
intent.initialMessage: Can you tell me if service is available at 2450 W Main St, Suite 110?

emotion.name: Matter-of-fact
emotion.description: States the issue plainly, provides specifics (invoice date, outage time), expects direct routing and minimal back-and-forth.

metadata.outcome: Callback time confirmed and contact number provided for Business Class sales.

turns.content: Can you tell me if service is available at 2450 W Main St, Suite 110?
Sure, I can check that for you. Is this a business location, and could I get your name, please?

messages: Sure, I can check that for you. Is this a business location, and could I get your name, please?

turns.content:
Yes, it’s a business location—it’s a gym.  
Name’s Robert King.
Thanks, Robert. To confirm availability we’ll need to chat with a Business Class agent. What date, time, and timezone work best for a call?

messages: Thanks, Robert. To confirm availability we’ll need to chat with a Business Class agent. What date, time, and timezone work best for a call?

turns.content: Let’s do this Thursday at 11:00 AM Eastern. If that’s not available, anytime between 10 AM–1 PM Eastern that day works.
Great, Robert, I’ve penciled in Thursday, January 15, 2026, 11:00 AM ET for a call with our Business Class agent. Could you share the best phone number to reach you so we can send a reminder text?

messages: Great, Robert, I’ve penciled in Thursday, January 15, 2026, 11:00 AM ET for a call with our Business Class agent. Could you share the best phone number to reach you so we can send a reminder text?

turns.content: You can reach me at 713-608-2106. A text reminder is fine.
